meanings.sent1: The deriver of the recipe was proud of their creation.
meanings.sent2: The deriver of the award was announced at the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The deriver of jokes always kept the room laughing.
meanings.sent4: She was a deriver of joy, spreading happiness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The deriver of knowledge shared wisdom with everyone around.

meanings.definition: To obtain or receive from a source.
meanings.sent1: She will deriver the package from the post office tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: He derivers fresh milk from the local dairy farm every morning.
meanings.sent3: The detective tried to deriver clues from the mysterious note.
meanings.sent4: The artist derivered inspiration from the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The students derivered valuable information from the educational video.
